home.main_description: The divine lightweight PHP framework engineered for fast, secure backends

hero.about_text:
Built from scratch for speed and security.
No Composer. No bloat. No magic.
Pure PHP backends you can ship fast.

philosophy.label: 01 - Philosophy
philosophy.title:
Fast.
Secure.
Easy to use.
philosophy.lead: Aether delivers ultra-fast, secure backends without the usual framework bloat. Built for freelancers and indie developers who need to ship quality backends quickly - without compromising on security or performance.
philosophy.pillar_1_text: 2ms cold boot, 1ms warm. Under 1MB of source. Zero runtime dependencies. Deploy anywhere, run instantly - no build steps, no vendor lock-in.
philosophy.pillar_2_text: HMAC-signed sessions, Argon2ID password hashing, CSRF protection, rate limiting, CSP headers, and prepared statements only. Security isn't optional - it's built in.
philosophy.pillar_3_text: Clone, configure, deploy. No package manager required. No hidden complexity. Build full backends quickly with clean, readable code that you actually understand.

examples.label: 02 - Syntax
examples.title: Clean code. Fast results.
examples.subtitle: Build SaaS platforms, REST APIs, e-commerce sites, blogs, and specialized services with minimal boilerplate.

security.label: 03 - Security Model
security.title:
Security
built in,
not bolted on.
security.intro: Aether is security-oriented by design. Every authentication flow, every session, every database query is protected from the ground up - so you can focus on building features, not patching vulnerabilities.
security.card_1_text: Session payloads are integrity-protected using HMAC signatures. Tampered sessions are rejected before they reach your code - automatic protection with zero configuration.
security.card_2_text: Modern, secure password hashing out of the box. No weak defaults, no deprecated algorithms - just industry-standard protection that works immediately.
security.card_3_text: Rate limiting, CSP headers, secure PHP.ini parameters, and CSRF token checking. All opt-in, all composable, all production-ready from day one.
security.card_4_text: Built-in role system with default user and admin permissions. Extend it for your needs or use it as-is - authorization is explicit, typed, and auditable.

features.label: 04 - Core Features
features.title:
Everything you need
to ship fast.
features.f1_text: Define routes directly in controller docblocks. No config files, no separate routing layer - routes live with the code they serve.
features.f2_text: Rate limiting, CSRF protection, CSP headers - all ready to use. Composable, testable, and designed to keep your app secure from day one.
features.f3_text: HMAC-signed sessions with centralized access. No scattered $_SESSION calls - just clean, secure session handling throughout your app.
features.f4_text: Argon2ID password hashing, permission-based roles, and ready-to-use login/register/logout flows. Secure authentication without the setup headache.
features.f5_text: No Composer packages at runtime. No vendor folder bloat. Pure PHP that deploys in seconds - perfect for shared hosting or containerized environments.
features.f6_text: Leverages enums, typed properties, readonly classes, and named arguments. Not retrofitted - built from the ground up for modern PHP.
features.f7_text: Query builder with prepared statements only. SQL injection protection is automatic - clean syntax, secure by design, no raw queries.
features.f8_text: Generate controllers, run scripts, bootstrap projects with php bin/aether. Fast scaffolding with zero configuration ceremony.

vision.label: 05 - Who Is It For?
vision.quote: Built for developers who need to ship quality backends fast.
vision.body_1: Aether is designed for freelance developers delivering client projects and indie developers working on SaaS, REST APIs, e-commerce platforms, blogs, community apps, and specialized services.
vision.body_2: No enterprise complexity. No framework magic. Just clean PHP you can understand, audit, and deploy in minutes - perfect for projects where speed, security, and simplicity matter most.

start.label: 06 - Get Started
start.title: Shipping in minutes.
start.desc: Clone, configure, deploy. No package manager. No build step. No ceremony. Start building secure, high-performance backends right now.
start.step_2_comment: Edit .env with your DB credentials and app settings
start.step_4_title: Point your server to the root
start.step_4_text: Configure Apache or Nginx to rewrite URLs to index.php. You're live - secure, fast, and ready to build.
